When the economic trend is shaking hands with inflation, you’re actually losing money. Your savings are burning away, and the time and effort you put in to earn that money is losing its value. Your time spent at your young age, your energy at your peak physical and mental strength could all go in vain. Now if you plan to sit and blame the economy you shall truly be guilty of wasting your money. Or, you could protect your savings and time spent by investing. At an average of 8% inflation rate and 6% of annual return on bank savings, investment opportunities in the stock market or mutual funds with 18-20% returns may seem lucrative.

However, do know that the risk these opportunities bear are quite high and they tend to leave you helpless when times are cloudy in the stock or money market. This is mostly because you lack essential control over your investment. To keep this control, you can try investing in real estate. Just like investing in gold, you can have control over your investment in real estate, minus the hassle of having to protect it and keep it secure at all times. Investing in real estate can also unsure tax benefits for you.


REAL ESTATE HOLDS ¾ OF THE WORLD’S WEALTH
Catherine Cote from the Department of Finance at the Harvard Business School termed real estate as the world’s largest asset class. According to Savills World Research, the value of global real estate reached an estimated $280.6 trillion at the end of 2017, making up more than 77 percent of the world’s wealth. So you can easily understand how you can benefit from investing in a market that holds 3/4th of the world’s wealth.



SMART INVESTMENTS

Investing in the capital city could be a good idea; especially right now when residential areas like Bashundhara, Gulshan, Dhanmondi, Banani, are not only retaining but booming in value. Something to keep in mind during making an investment in flats or apartments is the plan of the realtors. Your location of investment should be easily accessible, the surroundings should have good development prospects, in fact the very property that you would be investing in must stand the test of time for it to make your wealth grow.



Invest in best location

Edison Real Estate is developing such investment compatible properties where the projects are located in fine points that are easily accessible. These properties are strategically planned around 

surroundings that are aligned with the country’s plan of ultimate development, so that you can get the highest benefit out of your investment. If you plan to live in your tangible asset, you will have the best features and amenities to live a comfortable and luxurious life. If you plan to collect a quick dividend out of your investment by renting your flat out to a tenant, the location of every project is near to prime utility landmarks like schools, universities, banks, and hospitals.



Invest in time

The design concept and build materials used in Edison Real Estate projects can truly stand the test of time. In the modern world when people are breaking away from joint families and forming their own nucleus habitat, Edison projects are well equipped for its occupants to host family get together in community rooms, have a poolside experience, or even build good health practices in the gym. These simply make the property desirable, allowing you an extra zone of comfort when you are looking to liquidate your return on investment through resale.

In case you develop a personal relationship with your property and do not want to let it go, you can always choose to put it up for mortgage and avail secured bank loans for your plans while keeping the property to yourself and continue to enjoy rent benefits. If you are a business owner, then real estate investment can come as a blessing in disguise for you. Investing in apartments can help you diversify your asset portfolio.

All-in-all investment in good real estate can help you stay relaxed in critical economic situations and at the same time provide you the joy of heavy profit during economic progression.
